name: Brownies
description: Chocolate fudge brownies & chocolate peanut butter are currently available!

name: Almond Biscotti
description: A traditional Italian cookie made with toasted almonds and a hint of cinnamon.

name: Assorted Cookies
description: Chocolate chip, almond biscotti, Russian tea cookies, chocolate walnut truffles, currant walnut rugelach & lemon squares.

name: Cannoli
description: A crispy cannoli shell with a traditional ricotta, mascarpone and shaved chocolate filling.

name: Carrot Cake
description: Carrots, pineapple, coconut, walnuts, and cream cheese frosting.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Dark chocolate layers filled with rich chocolate ganache, finished with chocolate buttercream.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Made with dark chocolate chips, butter, fresh local eggs and brown sugar.

name: Chocolate Cream Tart
description: A buttery tart shell filled with rich chocolate pudding, topped with fresh whipped cream.

name: Classic Vanilla Cake
description: Traditional butter cake filled with a vanilla mascarpone cream, finished with vanilla buttercream and a seasonal design.

name: Coconut Cake
description: Moist coconut cake made with coconut and almond flour. Finished with light cream cheese frosting, then covered in shredded coconut.

name: Currant Walnut Rugelach
description: Cream cheese pastry brushed with butter then rolled with currants, walnuts and cinnamon sugar.

name: Fresh Fruit Tart
description: A buttery tart shell filled with vanilla custard, topped with fresh fruits of the season.

name: Muffins & Scones
description: Wild Blueberry Muffins. Scones: Cheddar Chive, Maple Walnut, Lemon Poppy, Lemon Ginger, Currant Walnut, or Cranberry Orange.

name: Pecan Russian Tea Cookies
description: A buttery shortbread cookie made rich toasted pecans, then powdered with confectionary sugar.

name: Raspberry Tart
description: A buttery tart shell filled with custard with a hint of lemon. Garnished with fresh raspberries and candied lemon zest.

name: Southern Pecan Tart
description: A traditional pecan filling in an all butter tart shell, perfect with vanilla ice cream. 1-2 day shelf-life.

name: Tiramisu
description: Sponge cake brushed with espresso rum syrup, layered with creamy mascarpone filling and cocoa. Finished with a coffee buttercream.

name: Vanilla Cheesecake
description: French style vanilla bean cheesecake with a raspberry mirroir. Garnished with fresh raspberries and blackberries when available.
